posts.post_content:
For sale is a nicely centered PSA 2.5 Good + of the scarce T-206 ERROR card of Ray Demmitt (St. Louis) version. See attached scan for further details and exact centering. Freshly graded by PSA with the new Lighthouse hologram. PayPal F/F only for payment to [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url]. Asking price is $2,750.00.

I'll take it trumps any negotiations. Thanks for looking. Any questions or if you need more scans, please e-mail me at [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url].

posts.post_title: Demmitt PSA 2.5 for Trade for O'Hara
posts.post_content: I would also consider a trade for a like minded PSA graded O'Hara error card, if that would work for anyone. PM me or e-mail me at [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url]
Any takers at $2,275.00 by Paypal F/F only for payment.

Card is sold. Thanks to all for the inquiries and offers.

Bill
